text:
Bollywood actor Irrfan Khan who announced to the world last year that he had been diagnosed with high grade cancer is now back to India. Irrfan is battling with neuro-endocrine tumour and was getting treated in London.
Twitter
But now as per a close source in a leading daily, the Hindi Medium actor is back in town. While some are saying he's getting treated at a hospital in Mumbai, some are thinking Irrfan is returning back to movies and starting with the shooting of Hindi Medium's sequel.
A source close to the actor in IANS confirmed that the globally renowned star is back, but dismissed all other claims. “Irrfan is back in Mumbai. But people are publishing all sorts of stories without any confirmation. They are not true,” the source said.

“I will get an update on his health and when will he be resuming work when I meet the actor soon,” the source added. The actor was last seen in Karwaan which was about a road trip along with Dulquer Salmaan and Mithila Parker.
The movie that released in August last year, could not have the actor on-board for the promotions because of his treatment.
title: After Battling A Rare Tumour, 'Hindi Medium' Actor Irrfan Khan Finally Returns To Mumbai
description: “I will get an update on his health and when will he be resuming work when I meet the actor soon,” the source added. Back in March last year, Irrfan had revealed that he has been diagnosed with a rare tumour. Soon after, he went to London for treatment.
